Reviews.Title: “Ideally located, but.....................”
Reviews.Author: ALIGWALES
Reviews.Content: partner stayed travelodge thurs 8 march sun 11 march 2012 travelodge ideally located 2 minute walk marylebone tube station tube line closed sunday due engineering baker street tube station 5 min walk arrived travelodge 2pm advised check 230pm pay £10 check 2pm decided wait 230pm drink bar offers bar – 2 bottles stella £6 bar evening stella offer removed change offer please remove billboards lift bar receptionist served drinks documentation returned key card stayed 5th floor ok – double bed 2 wardrobe spaces 1 wardrobe set coat hangers job brought own tea coffee facilities restocked everyday flat screen tv hot heating radiator kept window ajar curtains short light – ideal trying sleep bright light glaring bathroom lot desired shower power water build windowsill bathroom window overlooked offices distorted avoid prying eyes outside beware silhouette shape body showering bath held sealant patched avoid leaks toilet leaked dual flush toilets travelodge bathroom total refurb desperately lick paint carpet mattress bed dipped middle rolled night sink middle check time 12pm day due vacate walk 1130am access reception card didn’t experience noise maybe outside window towels changed day travelodge 3 pillows learnt previous experience pillow ritz budget time actually stay london
